original_text: I pray that God will help you and give you peace in your minds more and more. You will grow as believers because you know God and you know Jesus, our Lord. Peter Introduction Peter 2
korean_text: 하나님과 우리 주 예수를 앎으로 은혜와 평강이 너희에게 더욱 많을지어다

sentences.original_text: I pray that God will help you
and give you peace in your minds more and more.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신의 마음에 점점 더 평화를 주시기를

sentences.original_text: and you know Jesus, our Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신들은 우리 주님 예수님을 알기 때문입니다
